data.name: Relax In Space
data.detailed_description:
Relax In Space provides you the ability to explore space in stunning detail. Visit stars, moons, planets, black holes, and more! Relax In Space is meant for a casual experience, it doesn't require any skill to play, it's meant for all ages! At the main menu you can pick what system you want to visit. You will fly around in first person using a mouse and keyboard. The keyboard will let you move forward, back, up, down, left, and right. The mouse will let you look all around.

Be sure to add the game to your Steam wishlist! The first day the game launches it will be heavily discounted!

The game comes with at least 10 levels, each with a highly detailed object in them that you can look at.

Other details
- 4K Graphics
- HD Audio
- Replicas of Earth, Moon, Saturn, and Jupiter can be found
- Different star types, blue, red, orange
- Two different black holes to find
- An alien level
- And more!

Ambient music will be included but can be turned off if you want to listen to your own music.

Relax In Space was inspired by films like Interstellar, The Martian, GRAVITY, and more. Relax In Space provides you with the ability to travel and experience new worlds from the comfort of your home.

Some parts of this game include flashing lights! If you have a sensitivity to lights or flashing lights please be aware!

Get up close and personal with ultra high detailed planets like Earth!


Future Update Considerations -

- Experimental VR Support
- PS4/Xbox/Steam Controller Support
- Steam Achievements

data.short_description: You are a small nuclear powered space drone that has woken up from deep space travel. You are free to travel around the Universe visiting Alien stars, planets, moons, black holes, and more! Maybe you can even find a different dimension or fall into a black hole while you're at it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i7 10700k
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final
